name: Super Heros 1 Quiz | Comic Characters Mixed | 5 Questions

questions.text: Which of the following is a foe of Super Chicken?
questions.explanation:
The Zipper.

	One of the episode produced by Jay Ward with Bill Scott and Alex Anderson was titled 'Super Chicken vs. The Zipper.

questions.text: What does the Phantom call his throne of rock?
questions.explanation:
Skull Throne.

	'The Phantom' first appeared in American newspapers in 1936.

questions.text: What was the name of Mighty Mouse's girl friend?
questions.explanation:
Pearl Pureheart.

	'Here I come to save the day'. Mighty Mouse started out as Super Mouse and creator Paul Terry (Terry Toons) changed it in 1945.

Hal Foster.

	Wilson played Superman in a broadway musical, Wright was silent screens western hero Lion Man and Hart was Jungle King in the adventures of Captain Africa.

Steve Holland.

	Webb played Captain Midnight, Strimpell played Mister Terrific and Dibbs played Buck Rogers.
